Brief info on various files in this directory:
==============================================
1. firmware 
	-- Contains example of configuration file to generate standard firmware type OTA binary
	
2. info0_ota 
	-- Contains example of configuration file to generate INFO0 OTA binary
	
3. oem_chain_ota
	-- Contains example of configuration file to generate OEM cert chain OTA binary
	
4. secure-firmware
	-- Contains example of configuration file to generate Secure Firmware OTA binary
	
5. wired_br_ota
	-- 2 Step examples of configuration file to generate Wired BootROM OTA binary(firmware type OTA wrapped with wired download container)
	
6. wired_download
	-- Contains example of configuration file to generate standalone Wired Download OTA binary
	
7. wired_ota
	-- 2 Step examples of configuration file to generate Wired OTA binary(firmware type OTA wrapped with wired download container)
	
8. wired_secure_ota
	-- 2 Step examples of configuration file to generate Secure Wired OTA binary including(secure firmware type OTA wrapped with wired download container)
